title: Lost Boy
description: Will has spent his entire life waiting. He waits for a place to call home. He waits for people to call family. He waits so that maybe one day he can feel found.When all of his problems are solved in Neverland, a magical island where everyone lives forever, he begins to wonder if maybe he has finally found peace, but he quickly discovers he may be surrounded by those he cannot trust. Who will he believe? Is this really family or another lie? If Will wants to find what he's always been looking for, he must first find a way through the deceptions. Hemust learn to change for the better, to trust, to grow up, and to finally stop waiting.
author: Kassidy Mae Claren
